description: Red&nbsp;Sangria is a traditional Spanish wine punch made from&nbsp;dry red wine and chopped fruit, often orange juice or brandy. It only takes a few ingredients and fruit to make this bold and revitalizing mixed drink that will have everyone feeling energized.This popular drink is excellent for summertime because you can easily find all the fresh fruits needed at your local grocery stores like limes, oranges, berries, apples, or pears.
